TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Marshal extends System.Object
public ref class Marshal abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供了一个方法集，这些方法用于分配非托管内存、复制非托管内存块、将托管类型转换为非托管类型，此外还提供了在与非托管代码交互时使用的其他杂项方法。

span.span: Provides a collection of methods for allocating unmanaged memory, copying unmanaged memory blocks, and converting managed to unmanaged types, as well as other miscellaneous methods used when interacting with unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `static`上定义的方法类对使用非托管代码至关重要。The `static` methods defined on the class are essential to working with unmanaged code. 此类中定义的大多数方法常用的开发人员想要提供的托管和非托管编程模型之间的桥梁。Most methods defined in this class are typically used by developers who want to provide a bridge between the managed and unmanaged programming models. 例如，方法将 ANSI 字符 （中托管的堆） 的指定字符串复制到非托管堆中的缓冲区。For example, the method copies ANSI characters from a specified string (in the managed heap) to a buffer in the unmanaged heap. 它还会分配适当大小的目标堆。It also allocates the target heap of the right size. 公共语言运行时提供了特定的封送处理功能。The common language runtime provides specific marshaling capabilities. 有关封送处理行为的详细信息，请参阅[互操作封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/interop-marshaling.md)。For details on marshaling behavior, see [Interop Marshaling](~/docs/framework/interop/interop-marshaling.md). `Read`并`Write`中的方法类支持对齐和未对齐的访问权限。The `Read` and `Write` methods in the class support both aligned and unaligned access. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用各种方法由定义类。The following example shows how to use various methods defined by the class. [!code-cpp[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/cpp/marshal.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/CS/Marshal.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/VB/Marshal.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时管理 COM 对象的引用计数，这样就无需直接使用此方法。The common language runtime manages the reference count of a COM object for you, making it unnecessary to use this method directly. 在极少数情况下，例如测试自定义封送处理程序，您可能会发现手动处理对象的生存期。In rare cases, such as testing a custom marshaler, you might find it necessary to manipulate an object's lifetime manually. 在调用，必须使用一种方法类似于递减引用计数。After calling , you must decrement the reference count by using a method such as . 不要依赖的返回值，因为有时可能不稳定。Do not rely on the return value of , as it can sometimes be unstable. 您可以调用， ，或若要获取值，该值表示[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)接口指针。You can call , , or to obtain an value that represents an [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer. 此外可以使用这些方法和上托管的对象，若要获取由托管的对象的 COM 可调用包装器表示的 COM 接口的方法。You can also use these methods and the method on managed objects to obtain the COM interfaces represented by the managed object's COM callable wrapper. 如果您不熟悉此包装器类型的详细信息，请参阅[COM 可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)。If you are not familiar with the details of this wrapper type, see [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md).

The initial memory content returned is undefined, and the allocated memory can be larger than the requested number of bytes. 此方法公开 COM [CoTaskMemAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148626)函数，称为 COM 任务内存分配器。This method exposes the COM [CoTaskMemAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148626) function, which is referred to as the COM task memory allocator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的两个内存分配方法之一是类。 is one of two memory allocation methods in the class. (为其他。)此方法公开 Win32 [LocalAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148628) kernel32.dll 的函数。( is the other.) This method exposes the Win32 [LocalAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148628) function from Kernel32.dll. 当调用`LocalAlloc`，它将传递`LMEM_FIXED`标志，这会导致已分配的内存保持在原位置。When calls `LocalAlloc`, it passes a `LMEM_FIXED` flag, which causes the allocated memory to be locked in place. 此外，已分配的内存不是零填充。Also, the allocated memory is not zero-filled. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 指示是否可以清除任何上下文中的运行时可调用包装器 (RCW)。

span.span: if there are any RCWs available for cleanup; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有大量与深度依赖项关系图可能需要很长时间来清理的所有对象的托管和本机代码之间的引用。If there are a lot of references between managed and native code with deep dependency graphs it can take a long time for all the objects to clean up. 每次 GC 运行的时它将释放一定数量的 Rcw，又会释放底层的 COM 对象。Each time a GC runs it will free up some number of RCWs, which will in turn release the underlying COM objects. 这些 COM 对象将然后解除其托管的引用，并使更多的对象可清除下一次 GC 运行，这将启动该过程老调重弹。Those COM objects will then release their managed references and make more objects available for cleanup the next time a GC runs, which starts the process over again. 方法提供了一种方法来确定多少周期 GC 的应用程序。收集和 GC。WaitForPendingFinalizers 需求，以清理的所有内容。The method provides a way for the application to determine how many cycles of GC.Collect and GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers need to happen in order to clean everything up.

summary.span: 通知运行时清理当前上下文中分配的所有[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW)。

span.span: Notifies the runtime to clean up all [Runtime Callable Wrappers](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCWs) allocated in the current context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 互操作的系统同时会尝试清理 Rcw 抽取消息。The interop system pumps messages while it attempts to clean up RCWs. 有关单线程单元 (STA) Rcw 发生在所有应用程序，包括不经常抽取的应用程序，这可确保的清除。This ensures that cleanup for single-threaded apartment (STA) RCWs happens in all applications, including applications that do not pump often enough. 但是，某些应用程序执行操作进行了适当泵是对抽取出现的位置非常敏感。However, some applications that do pump appropriately are very sensitive to where pumping occurs. 当互操作的系统中的位置时，所期望的这些应用程序中抽取消息、 应用程序可能会遇到难以进行诊断的可重入性问题。When the interop system pumps messages in these applications, in places that are unexpected, , the application can encounter reentrancy issues that are difficult to diagnose. 因此，应用程序需要能够控制其自己发送有关特定 STA 并控制清除的 Rcw。Therefore, applications need to be able to control their own pumping for a particular STA and to control the clean-up of RCWs. 但是，开发人员通常只控制其应用程序中线程的子集，因此不能确保所有线程泵适当地都处理。However, developers often only control a subset of the threads in their application and thus cannot ensure that all threads are pumping appropriately. 若要解决此问题：To solve this problem: 1. 使用方法来关闭自动清除的 Rcw 和发生，针对每个线程的消息泵。Use the method to turn off automatic cleanup of RCWs, and the message pumping that occurs, on a per-thread basis. 这允许开发人员选择退出自动清理和相应的消息泵处理。This allows developers to opt out of automatic clean-up, and the corresponding message pumping. 2. 使用方法以通知运行时清理当前上下文中分配的所有 Rcw。Use the method to notify the runtime to clean up all RCWs that are allocated in the current context. 此方法允许开发人员能够精确地控制运行时执行清理当前上下文中时。This companion method allows developers to precisely control when the runtime performs cleanup in the current context.

summary.span: 将数据从非托管内存指针复制到托管 8 位无符号整数数组。

span.span: Copies data from an unmanaged memory pointer to a managed 8-bit unsigned integer array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非托管、 C 样式数组不包含边界的信息，这样可防止`startIndex`和`length`参数进行验证。Unmanaged, C-style arrays do not contain bounds information, which prevents the `startIndex` and `length` parameters from being validated. 因此，与对应的非托管的数据`source`参数填充而不考虑其有用性的托管的数组。Thus, the unmanaged data corresponding to the `source` parameter populates the managed array regardless of its usefulness. 调用此方法前，必须初始化使用适当的大小的托管的数组。You must initialize the managed array with the appropriate size before calling this method. ## Examples 下面的示例将数组复制到非托管内存，然后将非托管的数组复制回托管内存。The following example copies an array to unmanaged memory and then copies the unmanaged array back to managed memory. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将一个 COM 类类型，通常的基本转换`__ComObject`类型到另一种 COM 类类型。 converts one COM class type, typically the base `__ComObject` type, to another COM class type. 输入的 COM 对象，由参数表示`o`，是[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)(RCW)。The input COM object, represented by parameter `o`, is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW). 同时`t`并`o`参数必须是其签名与经过属性化的类。Both the `t` and `o` parameters must be classes whose signatures are attributed with . [Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具为您导入类型库时都应用此特性。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 如果在源代码中手动创建 RCW，应将此属性应用到表示原始 coclass 来表示其 COM 来源的托管签名。If you create the RCW manually in source code, you should apply this attribute to the managed signature that represents the original coclass to signify its COM origins. Tlbimp.exe 导入 COM[组件类](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582)作为托管的类和接口。Tlbimp.exe imports a COM [coclass](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582) as a managed class and an interface. 组件类接口具有与原始 coclass 相同的名称和托管的类具有在原始的组件类名称后追加"类"。The coclass interface has the same name as the original coclass, and the managed class has the original coclass name appended with "Class". 例如，名为组件类`MyCoclass`变得名为的组件类界面`MyCoclass`托管的类称为`MyCoclassClass`。For example, a coclass called `MyCoclass` becomes a coclass interface called `MyCoclass` and a managed class called `MyCoclassClass`. 由于`t`必须是一个类，而不是接口，请确保指定的托管的类 (`MyCoclassClass`) 并不是 coclass 接口。Since `t` must be a class, not an interface, be sure to specify the managed class (`MyCoclassClass`) and not the coclass interface. > [!NOTE] > 丢失的 COM 对象，因为新的 RCW 实例包装的输入的标识[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)由原始 RCW 公开的指针。You lose the identity of the input COM object because a new RCW instance wraps the [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) pointer exposed by the original RCW.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 COM 对象的类型转换`T`到`TWrapper`COM 类的类型。 converts a COM object of type `T` to the `TWrapper` COM class type. 输入的 COM 对象，由参数表示`o`，是[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)(RCW)。The input COM object, represented by parameter `o`, is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW). 这两个`T`泛型类型参数和`o`参数必须是其签名与经过属性化的类属性。Both the `T` generic type parameter and the `o` parameter must be classes whose signatures are attributed with the attribute. [Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具为您导入类型库时都应用此特性。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 如果在源代码中手动创建 RCW，应将此属性应用到表示原始 coclass 来表示其 COM 来源的托管签名。If you create the RCW manually in source code, you should apply this attribute to the managed signature that represents the original coclass to signify its COM origins. Tlbimp.exe 导入 COM[组件类](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582)作为托管的类和接口。Tlbimp.exe imports a COM [coclass](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582) as a managed class and an interface. 组件类接口具有与原始 coclass 相同的名称和托管的类具有在原始的组件类名称后追加"类"。The coclass interface has the same name as the original coclass, and the managed class has the original coclass name appended with "Class". 例如，名为组件类`MyCoclass`变得名为的组件类界面`MyCoclass`托管的类称为`MyCoclassClass`。For example, a coclass called `MyCoclass` becomes a coclass interface called `MyCoclass` and a managed class called `MyCoclassClass`. 因为`T`必须是一个类，而不是接口，请确保指定的托管的类 (`MyCoclassClass`)，而不`coclass`接口。Because`T` must be a class, not an interface, be sure to specify the managed class (`MyCoclassClass`) and not the `coclass` interface. > [!NOTE] > 因为新的 RCW 实例将会丢失的输入的 COM 对象，标识[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)由原始 RCW 公开的指针。You lose the identity of the input COM object, because a new RCW instance wraps the [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) pointer exposed by the original RCW.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法以释放引用类型字段，例如字符串的非托管结构。You can use this method to free reference-type fields, such as strings, of an unmanaged structure. 其与字段不同，值类型或引用类型可以是一种结构。Unlike its fields, a structure can be a value type or a reference type. 包含值类型的字段 (所有 blittable) 的值类型结构没有任何必须释放其内存的引用。Value-type structures that contain value-type fields (all blittable) have no references whose memory must be freed. 方法使用此方法来防止内存泄漏时重用结构占用的内存。The method uses this method to prevent memory leaks when reusing memory occupied by a structure. 调用 COM [SysFreeString](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148633)函数，这反过来，释放分配的字符串。 calls the COM [SysFreeString](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148633) function, which, in turn, frees an allocated string. 除了，则类提供了两个其他内存释放方法：和。In addition to , the class provides two other memory-deallocation methods: and .

summary.span: 通过将[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) 的引用计数设置为 0，释放对它的所有引用。

span.span: The new value of the reference count of the RCW associated with the parameter, which is 0 (zero) if the release is successful.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法释放 COM 对象的托管的引用。The method releases the managed reference to a COM object. 调用此方法相当于调用中循环，直到它返回 0 （零） 的方法。Calling this method is equivalent to calling the method in a loop until it returns 0 (zero). COM 对象的引用计数变为 0 时，COM 对象是通常释放，尽管这取决于 COM 对象实现并不在运行时的控件。When the reference count on the COM object becomes 0, the COM object is usually freed, although this depends on the COM object's implementation and is beyond the control of the runtime. 但是，RCW 可以仍然存在，等待进行垃圾回收。However, the RCW can still exist, waiting to be garbage-collected. 之后已从其基础 RCW 已分隔，不能使用 COM 对象。The COM object cannot be used after it has been separated from its underlying RCW. 如果你尝试在 RCW 上调用方法后其引用计数变为 0，将引发。If you try to call a method on the RCW after its reference count becomes 0, a will be thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像和，可以使用此方法来释放内存。Like and , you can use this method to deallocate memory. 调用 COM [SysFreeString](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148633)函数，释放任何以下非托管方法分配的内存： `SysAllocString`， `SysAllocStringByteLen`， `SysAllocStringLen`， `SysReAllocString`， `SysReAllocStringLen`。 calls the COM [SysFreeString](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148633) function, which frees memory allocated by any of the following unmanaged methods: `SysAllocString`, `SysAllocStringByteLen`, `SysAllocStringLen`, `SysReAllocString`, `SysReAllocStringLen`. 例如，使用平台调用，可以调用非托管的方法。You can call unmanaged methods such as these with platform invoke. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For details, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开 COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx) OLEAUT32 的函数。DLL;但是，后者要求将类标识符 (CLSID) 而不是编程标识符 (`ProgID`) 此方法所需的。 exposes the COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function from OLEAUT32.DLL; however, the latter expects a class identifier (CLSID) instead of the programmatic identifier (`ProgID`) expected by this method. 若要获取正在运行的没有已注册的 COM 对象实例`ProgID`，使用平台调用定义 COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx)函数。To obtain a running instance of a COM object without a registered `ProgID`, use platform invoke to define the COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function. 有关说明的平台调用，请参见[使用非托管 DLL 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For a description of platform invoke, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## ProgID 和 CLSIDProgID and CLSID 注册表的 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT 子树中的项中包含的各种子项的类型。Keys in the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT subtree of the registry contain a variety of subkey types. 子项的大多数都是将用户友好字符串映射到 CLSID 的 Progid。Most of the subkeys are ProgIDs, which map a user-friendly string to a CLSID. 应用程序通常使用这些用户可读的字符串，而不是数字的 Clsid。Applications often use these human-readable strings instead of the numeric CLSIDs. 通常情况下，某个组件具有映射到最新版本的组件的系统上安装一个独立于版本的 ProgID。Often, a component has a version-independent ProgID that is mapped to the latest version of the component that is installed on the system. 应用程序和组件主要使用 Progid 来检索其对应的 Clsid。Applications and components primarily use ProgIDs to retrieve their corresponding CLSIDs. ## Examples 下面的示例配置中的 Microsoft Word 运行实例的计算机上运行。The following example was run on a computer that was configured with a running instance of Microsoft Word. 没有任何实例运行的 Microsoft Excel。There were no instances of Microsoft Excel running. 此示例调用两次。The example calls twice. 第一次调用会尝试检索到的 Microsoft Word 实例的引用 (实例`Word.Application`对象)。The first call tries to retrieve a reference to an instance of Microsoft Word (an instance of the `Word.Application` object). 第二次调用会尝试检索到的 Microsoft Excel 实例的引用 (实例`Excel.Application`对象)。The second call tries to retrieve a reference to an instance of Microsoft Excel (an instance of an `Excel.Application` object). 代码已成功检索到的 Microsoft Word 实例的引用。The code retrieves a reference to an instance of Microsoft Word successfully. 但是，因为未运行 Microsoft Excel，则尝试检索第二个对象将引发。However, because Microsoft Excel is not running, the attempt to retrieve the second object raises a . [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetActiveObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.marshal.getactiveobject/cs/marshal.getactiveobject.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetActiveObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.marshal.getactiveobject/vb/marshal.getactiveobject.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回表示指定对象上请求的接口的接口指针。This method returns an interface pointer that represents the requested interface on the specified object. 如果您有一个需要传入一个接口指针的非托管的方法，它将特别有用。It is particularly useful if you have an unmanaged method that expects to be passed an interface pointer. 此方法与调用对象会导致要递增的接口指针上之前返回的指针的引用计数。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 始终使用要递减引用计数，完成后使用指针。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 您必须遵守的规则由 COM 使用原始 COM 接口指针时。You must adhere to the rules defined by COM when using raw COM interface pointers. 当调用方法公开为 COM 对象参数非常有用类型，或使用自定义封送处理。 is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 尽管不太常见，您可以托管对象上使用此方法以获取指向对象的 COM 可调用包装器。Although less common, you can use this method on a managed object to obtain a pointer to the object's COM callable wrapper. 例如，可以使用的托管对象的导出到 COM，若要获取的接口指针。For example, you can use on a managed object that is exported to COM to obtain an interface pointer for . 无法获取类接口的指针，因为类接口中没有要传递给第二个参数的相应类型 (`t`)。You cannot obtain a pointer to a class interface since a class interface lacks the corresponding type to pass to the second parameter (`t`). 请改用来调用在 COM 可调用包装器，这通常是一个自动调度类接口的默认接口成员。Instead, use to invoke the members on the default interface of the COM callable wrapper, which is usually an auto-dispatch class interface. 方法重载默认情况下允许查询界面自定义。The method overload allows query interface customization by default. 若要指定是否要应用查询界面自定义，请使用方法重载。To specify whether to apply query interface customization, use the method overload. 有关其他信息，请参阅[COM 可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)，[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)，并[类接口简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)主题。For additional information, see the [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md), [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), and [Introducing the Class Interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024) topics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回表示的接口指针`TInterface`上指定的对象的接口。This method returns an interface pointer that represents the `TInterface` interface on the specified object. 如果您有一个需要传入一个接口指针的非托管的方法，它将特别有用。It is particularly useful if you have an unmanaged method that expects to be passed an interface pointer. 此方法与调用对象会导致要递增的接口指针上之前返回的指针的引用计数。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 始终使用方法以递减引用计数后的指针。Always use the method to decrement the reference count when you have finished with the pointer. 您必须遵守的规则由 COM 使用原始 COM 接口指针时。You must adhere to the rules defined by COM when using raw COM interface pointers. 当调用方法公开为 COM 对象参数非常有用类型，或使用自定义封送处理。 is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 您还可用于此方法在托管对象上获取指向对象的 COM 可调用包装器，尽管这并不常见。You can also use this method on a managed object to obtain a pointer to the object's COM callable wrapper, although this is less common. 例如，可以使用的托管对象的导出到 COM，若要获取的接口指针。For example, you can use on a managed object that is exported to COM to obtain an interface pointer for . 方法重载默认情况下允许查询界面自定义。The method overload allows query interface customization by default. 若要指定是否要应用查询界面自定义，请使用方法重载。To specify whether to apply query interface customization, use the method overload. 有关其他信息，请参阅[COM 可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)，[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)，并[类接口简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)主题。For additional information, see the [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md), [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), and [Introducing the Class Interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024) topics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法帐户为三个返回的从零开始的槽号[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)和可能是四[IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)方法，使任一 3 的第一个可用槽的值或 7。The zero-based slot number returned by this method accounts for three [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) and possibly four [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5) methods, making the value of the first available slot either 3 or 7. 提供的功能相反。 provides the opposite functionality of . 此方法可用于检索槽编号是不可见的 COM 接口的成员和私有接口的成员。You can use this method to retrieve slot numbers for members of interfaces that are not visible from COM and for members of private interfaces. 返回的槽编号对应于如果向 COM 公开类型时将保留的表 v 数字The slot numbers returned correspond to the v-table numbers that would be reserved if the type was exposed to COM. COM 不可见成员实际占用的插槽中公开 v 表，即使 COM 客户端无法使用该槽。COM-invisible members actually occupy a slot in an exposed v-table, even though the COM client cannot use the slot. 不能使用通过将传递的类接口上从类。You cannot use on a class interface by passing from a class. 有关其他信息，请参阅[类接口简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)。For additional information, see [Introducing the Class Interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在版本 1.0 和 1.1 版.NET Framework 中，就可以传递一个表示到非托管代码的托管的方法，作为函数的指针，允许非托管的代码调用托管的方法通过函数指针的委托。In versions 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, it was possible to pass a delegate representing a managed method to unmanaged code as a function pointer, allowing the unmanaged code to call the managed method through the function pointer. 这也是可能的非托管代码传递回托管代码中，该函数指针和指针可以正确解析为基础的托管方法。It was also possible for the unmanaged code to pass that function pointer back to the managed code, and the pointer was resolved properly to the underlying managed method. 在.NET Framework 2.0 和更高版本中，可以使用和方法进行封送处理两个方向中的委托。In the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions, you can use the and methods to marshal delegates in both directions. 与，`ptr`作为导入。With , `ptr` is imported as a . 一个可以通过调用获取托管委托和传递作为参数; 它随后可以调用从非托管方法内。A can be obtained for a managed delegate by calling and passed as a parameter; it can then be called from inside the unmanaged method. 请注意，参数封送处理程序可以还封送到.NET Framework 2.0 及更高版本中的委托的函数指针。Note that the parameter marshaler can also marshal function pointers to delegates in the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions. 方法具有以下限制：The method has the following restrictions: - 在互操作方案中不支持这些泛型。Generics are not supported in interop scenarios. - 无法将无效的函数指针传递给此方法。You cannot pass an invalid function pointer to this method. - 此方法仅用于纯非托管的函数指针。You can use this method only for pure unmanaged function pointers. - 不能使用函数指针通过 c + + 或从获得使用此方法方法。You cannot use this method with function pointers obtained through C++ or from the method. - 不能使用此方法创建委托从函数指针到另一个托管委托。You cannot use this method to create a delegate from a function pointer to another managed delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托`d`转换为可传递给非托管的代码使用的函数指针[__stdcall](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e212594b-1827-4d07-9527-7d412b300df8)调用约定。The delegate `d` is converted to a function pointer that can be passed to unmanaged code using the [__stdcall](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e212594b-1827-4d07-9527-7d412b300df8) calling convention. 从托管代码由垃圾回收器收集，必须手动使委托。You must manually keep the delegate from being collected by the garbage collector from managed code. 垃圾回收器不会跟踪对非托管代码的引用。The garbage collector does not track references to unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外设置了[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)可以通过调用 COM GetErrorInfoNEEDGUID 函数获取异常的接口。 also sets up an [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface for the exception that can be obtained by calling the COM GetErrorInfoNEEDGUID function. 您可以使用此函数返回在其中应用一个 COM 接口的托管的类实现的 HRESULT 值属性。You can use this function to return an HRESULT value on a managed class implementation of a COM interface where you apply the attribute. 特性化的方法捕获所有异常，并使用方法以返回相应的 HRESULT 值。Have the attributed method catch all exceptions and use the method to return the appropriate HRESULT value. 允许异常传播在方法外部生成不正确的行为。Allowing an exception to propagate outside the method produces incorrect behavior. （事实上，公共语言运行时无法将异常传递给 COM 客户端调用通过 v 表这样的方法。）(In fact, the common language runtime fails to pass an exception to a COM client that calls such a method through a v-table.) 请注意，方法设置[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)当前线程的接口。Note that the method sets the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface of the current thread. 方法，例如，这可能会导致意外的结果默认使用的方法[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)当前线程，如果将其设置。This can cause unexpected results for methods like the methods that default to using the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) of the current thread if it is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须已在目标函数`setLastError`设置元数据标记。The target function must have had the `setLastError` metadata flag set. 例如，`SetLastError`字段必须是`true`。For example, the `SetLastError` field of the must be `true`. 设置此标志的过程取决于所使用的源语言： C# 和 c + +`false`默认情况下，但`Declare`在 Visual Basic 中的语句是`true`。The process for setting this flag depends on the source language used: C# and C++ are `false` by default, but the `Declare` statement in Visual Basic is `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索对应于 Win32 错误代码使用 HRESULT方法。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve an HRESULT corresponding to a Win32 error code using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在托管代码中，您很少直接使用`IDispatch`接口。In managed code, you seldom work directly with the `IDispatch` interface. 但是，时，可以调用方法公开的 COM 对象参数作为类型，或使用自定义封送处理。However, is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 此方法与调用对象会导致要递增的接口指针上之前返回的指针的引用计数。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 始终使用要递减引用计数，完成后使用指针。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 您可以在托管对象上使用此方法以获取指向 COM 可调用包装器对象的接口指针。You can also use this method on a managed object to obtain an interface pointer to the COM callable wrapper for the object. 有关其他信息，请参阅[COM 可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)。For additional information, see [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开 Win32 [GetLastError](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148657) kernel32.dll 的函数。 exposes the Win32 [GetLastError](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148657) function from Kernel32.DLL. 此方法存在的原因是不安全直接进行平台调用来调用`GetLastError`获取此信息。This method exists because it is not safe to make a direct platform invoke call to `GetLastError` to obtain this information. 如果你想要访问此错误代码，则必须调用而不是编写您自己的平台调用定义`GetLastError`并调用它。If you want to access this error code, you must call instead of writing your own platform invoke definition for `GetLastError` and calling it. 公共语言运行时可以覆盖的 api 的内部调用`GetLastError`由操作系统维护。The common language runtime can make internal calls to APIs that overwrite the `GetLastError` maintained by the operating system. 可以使用此方法以获取错误代码，当用户应用才到的方法签名并设置字段`true`。You can use this method to obtain error codes only if you apply the to the method signature and set the field to`true`. 这一过程各不相同取决于所使用的源语言： C# 和 c + +`false`默认情况下，但`Declare`在 Visual Basic 中的语句是`true`。The process for this varies depending upon the source language used: C# and C++ are `false` by default, but the `Declare` statement in Visual Basic is `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the method. 该示例首先演示了调用方法并不显示错误，然后演示调用并显示错误的方法。The example first demonstrates calling the method with no error present and then demonstrates calling the method with an error present. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值可能， ，或对象。The return value may be a , , or object. 返回值取决于托管给定 COM 槽中存在的成员的类型 (因此的通用的返回类型所有三个派生)。The return value depends on the type of managed member that exists in the given COM slot (hence the generalized return type from which all three derive). 此方法返回的从零开始的槽编号的三个帐户[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)和可能是四[IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)方法，使任一 3 的第一个可用槽的值或 7。The zero-based slot number that is returned by this method accounts for three [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) and possibly four [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5) methods, making the value of the first available slot either 3 or 7. 提供的功能相反。 provides the opposite functionality of . 可以使用并结合以传递指定的范围中的槽。You can use and in conjunction with to pass slots within a specified range. `memberType`参数仅在返回至关重要。The `memberType` parameter is important only on return. 它包含对应于返回的 COM 成员 （正则方法或属性访问器） 的类型对象。It contains the type of the COM member (a regular method or a property accessor) that corresponds to the returned object.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetObjectForIUnknown (IntPtr pUnk);
.method public static hidebysig object GetObjectForIUnknown(native int pUnk) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetObjectForIUnknown (pUnk As IntPtr) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetObjectForIUnknown(IntPtr pUnk);
static member GetObjectForIUnknown : nativeint -> obj

param.name: pUnk
param.span: 指向 接口的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the interface.

summary.span: 返回一个类型实例，该实例通过指向 COM 对象的 [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) 接口的指针表示该对象。

span.span: Returns an instance of a type that represents a COM object by a pointer to its [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface.

returns.span: 一个对象，表示指定的非托管 COM 对象。

span.span: An object that represents the specified unmanaged COM object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会包装`IUnknown`托管对象中。This method wraps `IUnknown` in a managed object. 递增引用计数 COM 组件的效果。This has the effect of incrementing the reference count of the COM component. 当运行时表示的 COM 对象的托管对象上执行垃圾回收时，引用计数将会减少。The reference count will be decremented when the runtime performs garbage collection on the managed object that represents the COM object. `pUnk`参数表示`IUnknown`接口指针; 但是，因为所有 COM 接口直接或间接派生`IUnknown`，可以将任何 COM 接口传递给此方法。The `pUnk` parameter represents an `IUnknown` interface pointer; however, because all COM interfaces derive directly or indirectly from `IUnknown`, you can pass any COM interface to this method. 返回的对象是[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)，公共语言运行时管理为其执行任何其他托管的对象。The object returned by is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), which the common language runtime manages as it does any other managed object. 此包装的类型通常是基`System.__ComObject`类型，这是隐藏的类型不明确的包装器类型时使用。The type of this wrapper is often a base `System.__ComObject` type, which is a hidden type used when the wrapper type is ambiguous. 您仍然可以进行后期绑定调用到这样的基类型，只要 COM 对象实现[IDispatch](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5(vs.85))接口。You can still make late-bound calls to such a base type as long as the COM object implements the [IDispatch](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5(vs.85)) interface. 同样，您可以强制转换为适当的 COM 接口返回的对象。Likewise, you can cast the returned object to an appropriate COM interface. 要包装的对象与特定的托管的类类型 （而不是泛型包装器类型），则必须遵守以下要求：For an object to be wrapped with a specific managed class type (and not a generic wrapper type), you must adhere to the following requirements: - 实现[IProvideClassInfo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148012) COM 对象的接口。Implement the [IProvideClassInfo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148012) interface for the COM object. - 注册与包含程序集[Regasm.exe （程序集注册工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)。Register the containing assembly with the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md). 或者，可以避免这些要求，并仍获取具有特定的托管的类类型使用包装的对象方法。Alternatively, you can avoid these requirements and still get an object that is wrapped with a specific managed class type by using the method.

returns.span: 如果接口基于 [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)，则第一个槽为 3；如果接口基于 [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)，则为 7。

span.span: The first slot is 3 if the interface is based on [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003), and 7 if the interface is based on [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个接口或类的从零开始的 v 表号。This method returns the zero-based v-table number for an interface or a class. 时的类上使用，则返回的槽编号引用类的类接口。When used on a class, the slot number that is returned refers to the class interface for the class. 如果此类接口是自动调度，则此方法始终返回-1 指示仅支持调度的接口不会公开 v 表向托管客户端。If the class interface is auto-dispatch, this method always returns -1 to indicate that the dispatch-only interface does not expose a v-table to managed clients. 可以使用并结合以传递指定的范围中的槽。You can use and in conjunction with to pass slots within a specified range. 有关其他信息，请参阅[类接口简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)。For additional information, see [Introducing the Class Interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024).

param.span: 指向非托管对象的 接口的一个指针。

summary.span: 返回表示 COM 对象的指定类型的托管对象。

span.span: Returns a managed object of a specified type that represents a COM object.

returns.span: 类的实例，与表示所请求的非托管 COM 对象的 对象相对应。

span.span: An instance of the class corresponding to the object that represents the requested unmanaged COM object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `t`参数必须是 COM 导入的类型或 COM 导入的类型的子类型。The `t` parameter must be either a COM-imported type or a subtype of a COM-imported type. 此外，`t`必须是由其元数据导入的类型[Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具。In addition, `t` must be a type whose metadata was imported by the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool. 此类型必须是一个类和不相关联的组件类接口，它包含的 COM 类的名称。This type must be a class and not an associated coclass interface, which carries the name of the COM class. 例如，如果 Tlbimp.exe 导入`Myclass`作为名为的类`MyclassClass`并作为组件类接口调用`Myclass`，必须使用`MyclassClass`(不`Myclass`) 使用此方法。For example, if Tlbimp.exe imports `Myclass` as a class called `MyclassClass` and as a coclass interface called `Myclass`, you must use `MyclassClass` (not `Myclass`) with this method. 有关导入的类和组件类接口的其他信息，请参阅[导入类型转换](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb1ee67d-8ef0-4e40-b2a5-13714b9f33c3)。For additional information about imported classes and coclass interfaces, see [Imported Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb1ee67d-8ef0-4e40-b2a5-13714b9f33c3). 如果已为获取了对象`pUnk`参数，`t`将被忽略，并返回现有对象。If an object has already been obtained for the `pUnk` parameter, `t` is ignored and the existing object is returned. `pUnk` 表示[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)接口指针; 但是，因为所有 COM 接口直接或间接派生`IUnknown`，可以将任何 COM 接口传递给此方法。`pUnk` represents an[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer; however, because all COM interfaces derive directly or indirectly from `IUnknown`, you can pass any COM interface to this method. 返回的对象是[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)(RCW)，因为它的公共语言运行时管理执行任何其他托管的对象。The object returned by is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW), which the common language runtime manages as it does any other managed object.

[Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具使用自定义封送处理程序将转换为`ITypeInfo`参数参数。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool uses the custom marshaler to translate `ITypeInfo` parameters to parameters. 但是，如果您获得`ITypeInfo`由一些接口意味着 Tlbimp.exe 以外，你可以使用为手动执行相同的转换。However, if you obtain an `ITypeInfo` interface by some means other than Tlbimp.exe, you can use to manually perform the same translation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回表示参数的非托管内存中的方法签名所需的堆栈大小 （以字节为单位）。The method returns the stack size (in bytes) needed to represent the parameters of a method signature in unmanaged memory. 请注意，此方法的返回值取决于平台。Note that the return value of this method is platform-dependent. 例如，具有一个整型参数的签名返回的值为 4 的 32 位平台和 64 位平台上的 8 的值上。For example, a signature with a single integer parameter returns a value of 4 on 32-bit platforms and a value of 8 on 64-bit platforms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安装程序任务提供早期初始化和调用目标方法时将自动执行。Setup tasks provide early initialization and are performed automatically when the target method is invoked. 首次执行任务包括：First-time tasks include the following: - 正在验证的平台调用元数据的格式正确。Verifying that the platform invoke metadata is correctly formatted. - 验证所有托管的类型都有效的参数的平台调用函数。Verifying that all the managed types are valid parameters of platform invoke functions. - 查找并加载到进程中的非托管的 DLL。Locating and loading the unmanaged DLL into the process. - 在过程中查找的入口点。Locating the entry point in the process. 调用平台以外的方法上调用不起作用。Calling on a method outside of platform invoke has no effect. 若要执行安装程序在所有平台上的任务调用方法在类型中，使用。To execute setup tasks on all platform invoke methods in a type, use .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法公开[iunknown:: Queryinterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) COM 对象，它会尝试获取特定的接口指针的方法。The method exposes the [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method of a COM object, which attempts to obtain a specific interface pointer. 使用`QueryInterface`对 COM 对象等同于在托管代码中执行强制转换运算。Using `QueryInterface` on a COM object is the same as performing a cast operation in managed code. 此方法与调用对象会导致要递增的接口指针上之前返回的指针的引用计数。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 始终使用要递减引用计数，完成后使用指针。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 若要获取值，该值表示[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)接口指针，可以调用， ，或。To obtain an value that represents a [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer, you can call , , or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有隐式偏移量为 0。 has an implied offset of 0. 此方法实现与非托管 C 样式直接交互`Int16`数组，消除了将复制整个的非托管的数组的费用 (使用) 到单独的托管数组，然后才能读取它的元素值。This method enables direct interaction with an unmanaged C-style `Int16` array, eliminating the expense of copying an entire unmanaged array (using ) to a separate managed array before reading its element values. 支持从未对齐的内存位置进行读取。Reading from unaligned memory locations is supported. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何读取和写入到非托管的数组使用和方法。The following example demonstrates how to read and write to an unmanaged array using the and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.interopServices.Marshal.Read-Write val#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.interopServices.Marshal.Read-Write val/cs/sample.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.interopServices.Marshal.Read-Write val#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.interopServices.Marshal.Read-Write val/vb/sample.vb#4)] 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来读取值的非托管`short`变量。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to read the value of an unmanaged `short` variable. remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时管理 COM 对象的引用计数，这样就无需直接使用此方法。The common language runtime manages the reference count of a COM object for you, making it unnecessary to use this method directly. 使用此值仅用于测试目的。Use this value only for testing purposes. 在极少数情况下，例如测试自定义封送处理程序，您可能会发现手动处理对象的生存期。In rare cases, such as testing a custom marshaler, you might find it necessary to manipulate an object's lifetime manually. 仅程序调用应调用。Only programs that call should call . 调用引用计数达到零将导致未定义的行为。Calling after the reference count has reached zero causes undefined behavior. 您可以调用， ，或若要获取值，该值表示[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)要发布的接口指针。You can call , , or to obtain an value that represents a [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer to release. 此外可以使用这些方法和上发布的托管对象所表示的 COM 接口的托管对象的方法[COM 可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)。You can also use these methods and the method on managed objects to release the COM interfaces represented by the managed object's [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索`IUnknown`接口的托管的对象使用方法。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve an `IUnknown` interface for a managed object using the method. 该示例然后释放接口指针通过调用方法。The example then releases the interface pointer by calling the method. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release/vb/example.vb#1)]

param.span: 要释放的 COM 对象。

summary.span: 递减与指定的 COM 对象关联的[运行时可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) 的引用计数。

span.span: Decrements the reference count of the [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) associated with the specified COM object.

returns.span: 与 关联的 RCW 的引用计数的新值。

span.span: The new value of the reference count of the RCW associated with .

returns.span: 此值通常为零，因为无论调用包装 COM 对象的托管客户端有多少，RCW 仅保留对该对象的一次引用。

span.span: This value is typically zero since the RCW keeps just one reference to the wrapped COM object regardless of the number of managed clients calling it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法以显式控制从托管代码使用 COM 对象的生存期。This method is used to explicitly control the lifetime of a COM object used from managed code. 应使用此方法来释放包含对资源的引用，及时地或按特定顺序，必须释放对象的基础 COM 对象。You should use this method to free the underlying COM object that holds references to resources in a timely manner or when objects must be freed in a specific order. 每次 COM 接口指针进入公共语言运行时 (CLR)，则将其包装在 RCW。Every time a COM interface pointer enters the common language runtime (CLR), it is wrapped in an RCW. RCW 都有每次 COM 接口指针映射到其递增引用计数。The RCW has a reference count that is incremented every time a COM interface pointer is mapped to it. 方法递减引用计数的 RCW。The method decrements the reference count of an RCW. 当引用计数达到零时，运行时释放非托管 COM 对象上的所有引用，并引发如果尝试进行进一步使用该对象。When the reference count reaches zero, the runtime releases all its references on the unmanaged COM object, and throws a if you attempt to use the object further. 如果相同的 COM 接口传递一次从非托管到托管代码，包装的引用计数是每次递增和调用返回剩余引用数。If the same COM interface is passed more than one time from unmanaged to managed code, the reference count on the wrapper is incremented every time, and calling returns the number of remaining references. 此方法，可强制进行精确地在需要时才对 RCW 的引用计数版本。This method enables you to force an RCW reference count release so that it occurs precisely when you want it to. 但是，使用不当可能会导致应用程序失败，或可能会导致访问冲突。However, improper use of may cause your application to fail, or may cause an access violation. 请考虑到 RCW 表示的 COM 组件上持有的应用程序域中的托管的代码的方案。Consider a scenario in which managed code in an application domain is holding onto an RCW that represents a COM component. 如果您调用方法在 RCW 上的托管的代码将不能访问 RCW 和将引发异常。If you call the method on the RCW, the managed code will be unable to access the RCW and will raise an exception. 如果对 RCW 的调用正在释放 RCW 时，可能出现更严重的错误。A more serious error may occur if a call to the RCW is executing when the RCW is released. 在这种情况下，是很可能进行的调用的线程将导致访问冲突。In this case, there is a good chance that the thread making the call will cause an access violation. 但是，可能会损坏进程内存，并且进程可能会继续运行直到失败的原因，很难调试。However, process memory may become corrupted, and the process may continue to run until it fails for reasons that are very difficult to debug. 这种风险很复杂，如果正在使用的 COM 组件是一个单例，出于以下原因： CLR 激活 COM 组件通过调用 COM [CoCreateInstance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=142894)函数，返回相同的接口指针，每个为单一实例 COM 组件调用的时间。This risk is compounded when the COM component that is being used is a singleton, for the following reason: The CLR activates COM components by calling the COM [CoCreateInstance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=142894) function, which returns the same interface pointer every time it is called for singleton COM components. 因此，应用程序域中的托管代码的独立部分可以使用相同的 RCW 的单一实例 COM 组件，如果其中一个调用COM 组件的方法，另一个将成为中断。Thus, separate and independent pieces of managed code in an application domain can be using the same RCW for a singleton COM component, and if either one calls the method on the COM component, the other will be broken. 因此，使用仅当绝对必要时。Therefore, use the only if it is absolutely required. 如果你想要调用此方法可确保在确定时间释放 COM 组件，请考虑使用方法相反。If you want to call this method to ensure that a COM component is released at a determined time, consider using the method instead. 将释放基础 COM 组件而不考虑其已重新进入 CLR 的次数。 will release the underlying COM component regardless of how many times it has re-entered the CLR. 每次 COM 组件重新进入 CLR 时，由一个递增的 rcw 的内部引用计数。The internal reference count of the RCW is incremented by one every time the COM component re-enters the CLR. 因此，您可以调用方法在一个循环，直到返回的值为零。Therefore, you could call the method in a loop until the value returned is zero. 这实现了相同的结果方法。This achieves the same result as the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用于自定义封送处理或在混合托管和非托管代码。The method is useful for custom marshaling or when mixing managed and unmanaged code. 通过调用此方法分配字符串所需的非托管的内存，因为始终释放的内存方法。Because this method allocates the unmanaged memory required for a string, always free the memory by calling the method. 字符串的字符复制为 Unicode 字符。The characters of the string are copied as Unicode characters. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法进行封送和解密的内容到非托管内存块的对象。The following example uses the method to marshal and decrypt the contents of a object to a block of unmanaged memory. 然后，它使用清零和释放非托管的块的方法。It then uses the method to zero out and dispose the unmanaged block. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemUnicode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemUnicode/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemUnicode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemUnicode/vb/sample.vb#1)]

param.name: structure
param.span: 要返回其大小的对象。

span.span: The object whose size is to be returned.

summary.span: 返回对象的非托管大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Returns the unmanaged size of an object in bytes.

returns.span: 非托管代码中指定对象的大小。

span.span: The size of the specified object in unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法接受一个结构，它可以是引用类型或装箱的值类型的实例。This method accepts an instance of a structure, which can be a reference type or a boxed value type. 布局必须是连续或显式。The layout must be sequential or explicit. 返回大小为非托管对象的大小。The size returned is the size of the unmanaged object. 一个对象的非托管和托管大小可能不同。The unmanaged and managed sizes of an object can differ. 对于字符类型，大小受值应用于该类。For character types, the size is affected by the value applied to that class. 可以使用方法来确定非托管的内存量，以分配使用和方法。You can use the method to determine how much unmanaged memory to allocate using the and methods. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个托管的结构，将其传输到非托管内存，然后将其传输回托管内存。The following example creates a managed structure, transfers it to unmanaged memory, and then transfers it back to managed memory. 此示例使用方法来确定分配多少非托管的内存。This example uses the method to determine how much unmanaged memory to allocate. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/vb/sample.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("StructureToPtr(Object, IntPtr, Boolean) may be unavailable in future releases. Instead, use StructureToPtr<T>(T, IntPtr, Boolean). For more info, go to http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=296516")

param.name: structure
param.span: 托管对象，包含要封送的数据。

span.span: A managed object that holds the data to be marshaled.

param.span: 该对象必须是格式化类的结构或实例。

span.span: This object must be a structure or an instance of a formatted class.

param.name: ptr
param.span: 指向非托管内存块的指针，必须在调用此方法之前分配该指针。

span.span: A pointer to an unmanaged block of memory, which must be allocated before this method is called.

param.name: fDeleteOld
param.span: 如果在此方法复制该数据前在 ptr 参数上调用 方法，则为 。

span.span: to call the method on the ptr parameter before this method copies the data.

param.span: 该块必须包含有效的数据。

span.span: The block must contain valid data.

param.span: 请注意，在内存块已包含数据时传递 可能会导致内存泄漏。

span.span: Note that passing when the memory block already contains data can lead to a memory leak.

summary.span: 将数据从托管对象封送到非托管内存块。

span.span: Marshals data from a managed object to an unmanaged block of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`structure`是值类型，它可以装箱或取消装箱。If `structure` is a value type, it can be boxed or unboxed. 如果它进行装箱时，它是未装箱复制之前。If it is boxed, it is unboxed before copying. 格式化的类是引用类型由指定其布局属性，则为或。A formatted class is a reference type whose layout is specified by the attribute, as either or . 将复制的内容`structure`到预先分配的内存块的`ptr`参数指向。 copies the contents of `structure` to the pre-allocated block of memory that the `ptr` parameter points to. 如果`structure`包含封送到 COM 接口指针的引用类型 (接口，而无需布局，类和)，托管的对象保留引用计数在处于活动状态。If `structure` contains reference types that marshal to COM interface pointers (interfaces, classes without layout, and ), the managed objects are kept alive with reference counts. 所有其他引用类型 （例如，字符串和数组） 封送到副本。All other reference types (for example, strings and arrays) are marshaled to copies. 若要释放这些托管或非托管对象，必须调用方法之前释放内存块。To release these managed or unmanaged objects, you must call the method before you free the memory block. 如果您使用方法将不同的实例复制到的内存块，在更高版本时，指定`true`为`fDeleteOld`要删除的引用计数中的前一个实例的引用类型。If you use the method to copy a different instance to the memory block at a later time, specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` to remove reference counts for reference types in the previous instance. 否则，有效地泄露托管的参考 typesand 非托管的副本。Otherwise, the managed reference typesand unmanaged copies are effectively leaked. 总体使用模式如下所示：The overall pattern for using is as follows: 1. 在首次调用方法后已分配的内存块`fDeleteOld`必须是`false`，因为没有要清除的内容。On the first call to the method after a memory block has been allocated, `fDeleteOld` must be `false`, because there are no contents to clear. > [!IMPORTANT] > 指定`true`为`fDeleteOld`只有在块中包含有效的数据。Specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` only if the block contains valid data. 2. 如果将不同的实例复制到的内存块，并且该对象包含引用类型`fDeleteOld`必须是`true`来释放旧内容中的引用类型。If you copy a different instance to the memory block, and the object contains reference types, `fDeleteOld` must be `true` to free reference types in the old contents. 3. 如果对象包含引用类型，则必须调用方法之前释放内存块。If the object contains reference types, you must call the method before you free the memory block. > [!NOTE] > 若要固定现有结构而不是复制它，请使用要创建该结构的固定句柄类型。To pin an existing structure instead of copying it, use the type to create a pinned handle for the structure. 有关如何将固定的详细信息，请参阅[复制和锁定](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md)。For details on how to pin, see [Copying and Pinning](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md). ## Examples 以下示例创建一个托管的结构、 将其传输到非托管的内存使用方法，，然后将它传输回托管的内存使用方法。The following example creates a managed structure, transfers it to unmanaged memory using the method, and then transfers it back to managed memory using the method. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ThrowExceptionForHR (int errorCode);
.method public static hidebysig void ThrowExceptionForHR(int32 errorCode) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ThrowExceptionForHR (errorCode As Integer)
public: static void ThrowExceptionForHR(int errorCode);
static member ThrowExceptionForHR : int -> unit

param.name: errorCode
param.span: 与所需异常相对应的 HRESULT。

span.span: The HRESULT corresponding to the desired exception.

summary.span: 用特定的失败 HRESULT 值引发异常。

span.span: Throws an exception with a specific failure HRESULT value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建一个异常对象，用于指定失败 HRESULT。This method creates an exception object for the specified failure HRESULT. 如果 HRESULT 为 0 或正数 （成功代码），该方法将返回而不创建或引发异常。If the HRESULT is 0 or positive (a success code), the method returns without creating or throwing an exception. 请注意，方法将返回基于异常[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)当前线程，如果已设置的接口。Note that the method returns an exception based on the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface of the current thread if one is set. 在此情况下，`errorCode`参数将被忽略。When this happens, the `errorCode` parameter is ignored. 某些失败的 hresult 均映射到定义异常，而有些则不。Some failure HRESULTs map to defined exceptions, whereas others do not. 如果 HRESULT 映射到已定义的异常，创建异常的实例，并在引发。If the HRESULT maps to a defined exception, creates an instance of the exception and throws it. 否则，它将创建的实例、 初始化，错误为 HRESULT，错误代码字段，则引发该异常。Otherwise, it creates an instance of , initializes the error code field with the HRESULT, and throws that exception. 当是调用，它会尝试使用非托管检索有关错误的额外信息[GetErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221032\(v=vs.85\).aspx)函数。When is invoked, it attempts to retrieve extra information regarding the error by using the unmanaged [GetErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221032\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function. 从每个 HRESULT 到其.NET Framework 中的相似异常类的映射，请参阅[如何： 映射 Hresult 和异常](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For the mapping from each HRESULT to its comparable exception class in the .NET Framework, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md). 有时，可能会从上一个 COM 调用返回异常。Occasionally, might return an exception from a previous COM call. 在这种情况下，可以使用以下解决方法并传递`IntPtr(-1)`作为第二个参数 (`errorInfo`):In this case, you can use the following workaround and pass `IntPtr(-1)` as the second parameter (`errorInfo`): ``` [SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.LinkDemand, Flags = SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode)] public static void ThrowExceptionForHR(interrorCode,IntPtrerrorInfo) ```

param.name: errorCode
param.span: 与所需异常相对应的 HRESULT。

span.span: The HRESULT corresponding to the desired exception.

param.name: errorInfo
param.span: 指向 [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) 接口的指针，该接口提供有关错误的详细信息。

span.span: A pointer to the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface that provides more information about the error.

param.span: 可以指定 IntPtr(0) 以使用当前的 [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) 接口，或者 IntPtr(-1) 以忽略当前的 [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) 接口，并仅从错误代码构造异常。

span.span: You can specify IntPtr(0) to use the current [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface, or IntPtr(-1) to ignore the current [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface and construct the exception just from the error code.

summary.span: 基于指定的 [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) 接口，用特定的失败 HRESULT 引发异常。

span.span: Throws an exception with a specific failure HRESULT, based on the specified [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建一个异常对象，用于指定失败 HRESULT。This method creates an exception object for the specified failure HRESULT. 如果 HRESULT 为 0 或正数 （成功代码），该方法将返回而不创建或引发异常。If the HRESULT is 0 or positive (a success code), the method returns without creating or throwing an exception. 方法将释放`errorInfo`参数，减少 COM 引用的计数[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)接口。The method releases the `errorInfo` parameter, decreasing the COM reference count of the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface. 请注意，方法将返回基于异常[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)当前线程，如果已设置的接口。Note that the method returns an exception based on the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface of the current thread if one is set. 在此情况下，`errorCode`参数将被忽略。When this happens, the `errorCode` parameter is ignored. 某些失败的 hresult 均映射到定义异常，而有些则不。Some failure HRESULTs map to defined exceptions, whereas others do not. 如果 HRESULT 映射到已定义的异常，创建异常的实例，并在引发。If the HRESULT maps to a defined exception, creates an instance of the exception and throws it. 否则，它将创建的实例、 初始化，错误为 HRESULT，错误代码字段，则引发该异常。Otherwise, it creates an instance of , initializes the error code field with the HRESULT, and throws that exception. `errorInfo`参数用于检索有关错误的额外信息。The `errorInfo` parameter is used to retrieve extra information regarding the error. 从每个 HRESULT 到其.NET Framework 中的相似异常类的映射，请参阅[如何： 映射 Hresult 和异常](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For the mapping from each HRESULT to its comparable exception class in the .NET Framework, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使你能够直接与非托管的 C 样式字节数组，消除了将复制整个的非托管的数组的费用的交互 (使用) 到单独的托管数组之前设置它的元素值。 enables direct interaction with an unmanaged C-style byte array, eliminating the expense of copying an entire unmanaged array (using ) to a separate managed array before setting its element values. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的非托管内存块、 将一个字节写入到非托管内存中，从非托管内存读取的字节，然后释放非托管的内存。The following example creates a block of unmanaged memory, writes a byte to the unmanaged memory, reads the byte back from unmanaged memory, and then disposes the unmanaged memory. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/vb/example.vb#1)]
